### Explanation
June is the most expensive month to visit Madrid. When booking to Madrid, most of the airlines are similar in price, so it is important to take all into account when booking.
Iberia and British Airways are highly flexible offering the most flights! If budget is priority, September return flights are as little as 50 pounds!

### Explanation

Flight prices from London airports to Madrid are fairly consistent as we see median prices peak in July and lowest in September. It is interesting to see the large variability in minimum prices from Heathrow compared to Stansted where prices are relatively stable which can reflect types of carrier providers or consumer behaviours.
